## Design System Compliance âœ…

All UI changes must follow the EndZone Design System guidelines (see `DESIGN_SYSTEM.md`):

- [ ] **No hardcoded text colors** - No `text-gray-*`, `text-white`, or `text-black` used
- [ ] **No hardcoded backgrounds** - No `bg-white` or `bg-gray-*` used
- [ ] **No hardcoded borders** - No `border-gray-*` used
- [ ] **Uses semantic tokens** - All colors use `card-foreground`, `bg-card`, `border-border`, etc.
- [ ] **Proper text contrast** - Text readable on all backgrounds (light and dark)
- [ ] **Follows component patterns** - Uses established patterns from design system
- [ ] **Opacity levels consistent** - Uses 100%, 80%, 70%, 60% for text hierarchy
- [ ] **Tested in dark mode** - If applicable, verified theme compatibility

## Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined
- [ ] Reusable components created where appropriate
- [ ] Dead code removed

- [ ] Tested on desktop browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
- [ ] Tested on mobile viewports
- [ ] Tested all user interactions
- [ ] Tested error states and edge cases
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality
